profile.name: Dave Cheney
profile.headline: Senior Software Engineer at GitHub | Database Sharding Enthusiast
profile.summary: Highly motivated software engineer with a passion for database sharding and systems programming. With expertise in Rust, Python, and a strong background in open source development.

experience.title: Senior Software Engineer at GitHub
description: Leading the development of sharding solutions for GitHub's database infrastructure
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to design and implement scalable systems

experience.title: Freelance Developer
description: Developing custom software solutions for clients across various industries
Maintaining open source projects on GitHub and contributing to the Rust community

experience.title: Open Source Maintainer
description: Contributing to popular Rust libraries and frameworks
Collaborating with other maintainers to improve project quality
